name: places/ChIJJ-Uc82ROwokRsi0RzledUPg
formattedAddress: 335 Lenox Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 335 Lenox Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: Last week I went to visit Lenox Dental. For starters, the receptionist are amazing and very hospitable. She explained to me what she needed from me and the reasons why. I barely had to be seen by the doctor. My experience with Dr. Gizerskaya was outstanding and her dental assistant Juliana was very kind, attentive and best of all she was very comforting. After taking my X-Rays, Dr. Gizerskaya came in to do my cleaning. She asked if I was having any pain and explained to me what she was going to do. Once she was finished, my mouth was clean and I was satisfied with the service. For this reason, I highly recommend this dentist.

originalText.text: I rarely write reviews but had such amazing care that I felt the need to share my experience. I  am having trouble deciding if it was Dr Alla Gizerskaya’s incredible Dental skills OR her intense compassion and kindness  OR her delicate touch that made this such a positive and pleasant experience and have decided it was a big tie of all of these things!  I had a root canal elsewhere and needed a buildup and a crown. After the root canal I was terrified of pain  from the shot to numb the area. Dr Gizerskaya’s gentle touch is unbelievably amazing. The shot did not hurt and the rest was smooth sailing. She treats your tooth like a precious commodity and treats you as a person with such kindness. You can feel the care she has for making it a painless experience AND you can tell she loves what she is doing and that she strives for perfection. She really makes you feel like you are her only patient for the day (as opposed to other doctors who rush to get to the next person.) She talks you through what she is doing and makes the process as pleasant as possible. I left with no pain and am so happy I found her! I obviously hope I don’t need any more  crowns in the future but if I do, I now know immediately where I will be going! Thank you for such wonderful care!
